title: Minecraft 主机版 TU61/1.66/1.66/Patch 31/Patch 12 发布
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2018-1-31 21:39 编辑 

主机版即Xbox 360，Xbox One版，PlayStation 3/4/Vita版，WiiU版，Switch版，由4J Studios为Mojang开发。 迎接新的正式版吧！ 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。  

Added Moana Character Pack
新增《海洋奇缘》皮肤包
Added Skin Pack 1
新增一号皮肤包（仅WiiU/Switch）
Fixed MCCE-6589: Pistons of both types can't move Cauldrons.
修复了MCCE-6589：两种活塞都无法移动酿药锅
Fixed MCCE-6531: Placing a bed next to a cactus crashes the game.
修复了MCCE-6531：在仙人掌旁放置床会导致游戏崩溃
Fixed MCCE-6376: Observer Blocks don't detect some changes, like other powered Observers.
修复了MCCE-6376：观察者方块检测不到观察者能源之类的变化
Fixed MCCE-6465: Unable to place vines under torches.
修复了MCCE:6465：无法将藤蔓放在火把下面
Fixed a bug where Animals are not running away when hit on Peaceful Difficulty.
修复了和平难度时生物不会逃跑的BUG
Fixed a bug where Tamed Horses with no items equipped despawn after a Player leaves the area.
修复了玩家离开时没有装备的被驯服马消失的问题
Fixed a bug that was reducing the Horizontal distance a Horse would travel when Jumping
修复了马跳跃时水平距离错误的BUG
Change to xplosions so that TNT cannons in Mashup worlds work as they used to.
更改了TNT不能在混搭包的存档中正常工作的爆炸
Fixed a bug where a block could not be moved while a sign was attached to it
修复了不能移动命名方块的BUG
Fixed a bug where a block could not be moved while a Banner was attached to it
修复了不能移动有旗帜方块的BUG
Fixed a bug where Tripwire hooks on the sides of Pistons would drop when the Piston was extended/retracted.
修复了活塞伸缩时挂在活塞两侧的拌线钩掉落的BUG
Fixed a bug where Compaators would not register Chest and Trapped Chest size changes.
修复了比较器不会接受箱子和箱子尺寸的变化的BUG
Fixed a bug where Rails and Torches couldn't be placed on Glowstone, Sea Lanterns, Glass, or Ice.
修复了铁轨和火把不能放置在海晶石、海晶灯、玻璃或冰上的BUG
Fixed a bug where Flowerpots, Doors, and Pumpkins couldn't be placed on Glass.
修复了花盆、门和南瓜不能放在玻璃上的BUG
Fixed a bug where Redstone, Levers, and Buttons couldn't be placed on Pistons.
修复了红石、拉杆和按钮不能放在活塞上的BUG
Fixed a bug that would allow players to Open Shulker Boxes while 'Trust Players' and 'Can Open Containers' options are disabled.修复了当“信任玩家”和“可以打开容器”选项被禁用时玩家仍能打开潜影箱的BUGEnchantment Experience costs in Creative Mode now match Bedrock Edition创造模式的附魔经验花费现在与基岩版相同Pistons can now move small chests but only if the new position would have been valid for players to place a new chest.
活塞现在可以移动小箱子了，但前提是新位置对于玩家放置新箱子是有效的

  外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪 
Mojang官方博客（英文）4JStudios的Twitter（英文，内地需翻墙）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）官方更新日志（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Console Edition version history页面（英文，更新条目详细）中文 Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
